description: The attributes that identify network proxy attributes.
caption: Network Proxy
name: network_proxy

proxy_connection_info.description: The connection information from the network proxy to the remote server.

proxy_http_request.description: The HTTP Request Object documents attributes of a request made from the network proxy to the remote server.

proxy_http_response.description: The HTTP Response from the remote server to the network proxy.

proxy_traffic.description: The network traffic refers to the amount of data moving across a network, from proxy to remote server at a given point of time. Intended to be used alongside Network Connection.

proxy_tls.description: The Transport Layer Security (TLS) attributes from the network proxy to the remote server.
